last_episode_to_air.name: The Charity Single
last_episode_to_air.overview: Susan Mitchell decides to record a charity single to raise funds for Brimlington Hospital. Local choirmaster Neville Burle has been brought in to produce it, but Susan and Neville don't see eye to eye. Kenny prepares for his audition in the choir, Ivan gets to grips with his new studio equipment, and Ian's talents are finally recognised by the outside world.

name: Hospital People
overview: Set in a fictional hospital, this mockumentary follows the lives of porters, hospital radio DJs, chaplains and managers asking who exactly are all these people, and should any of them be remotely near a hospital?

episodes.name: The Hospital Awards
episodes.overview: It's the moment that hospital manager Susan Mitchell has been waiting for - she has won the bid for Brimlington to host the Annual Regional Hospital Awards. She has bagged a star host for the evening, Jeremy Lace, a veteran of long-running fictional hospital drama Good Medicine. Hospital chaplain Father Kenny and resident radio DJ Ivan vie for the Patients Choice Awards, while Ian is forced to face conventional medicine head on.

episodes.name: The Security Threat
episodes.overview: There has been an intruder at Brimlington Hospital. Head of hospital security Hilary is given a briefing from manager Susan Mitchell to up security at no expense spared. Hospital radio DJ Ivan Brackenbury has an admirer, whilst porter and self-appointed resident psychic healer Ian gets involved in mistaken identity, and Father Kenny has a new toy.

episodes.name: The Local Millionaire
episodes.overview: Due to illness, benevolent local businessman Tony Jackson finds himself in Brimlington Hospital, much to manager Susan Mitchell's delight. Kenny finds a kindred spirit, while porter Ian meets his nemesis. Ivan raises money to help someone get to America for treatment, but does he have an ulterior motive?

episodes.name: The Health Guru
episodes.overview: Following the death of a staff member, manager Susan Mitchell wants to promote healthy living at Brimlington Hospital. She decides that the best way to do this is to hire celebrity nutritionist Tyler Watt to shake things up. The health drive hits Ivan hard, keeps Ian busy and allows Kenny to plan for the biggest gig of his career.

episodes.name: The New Ward
episodes.overview: Helena Steel MP is coming to open the new ward at Brimlington Hospital and manager Susan Mitchell is desperate to impress. Father Kenny sees an opportunity to increase his audience, while psychic porter Ian tries to find a place to practise his practice. Hospital radio stalwart Ivan continues to find whacky ways to raise money but has a nasty run-in with manager Susan.

episodes.name: The Charity Single
episodes.overview: Susan Mitchell decides to record a charity single to raise funds for Brimlington Hospital. Local choirmaster Neville Burle has been brought in to produce it, but Susan and Neville don't see eye to eye. Kenny prepares for his audition in the choir, Ivan gets to grips with his new studio equipment, and Ian's talents are finally recognised by the outside world.
